Title: Includes contacts via text, email or other electronic communication in the definition of the offense of aggravated harassment in the second degree
Summary: Includes contacts via text, email or other electronic communication in the definition of the offense of aggravated harassment in the second degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to including contacts via text, email or other electronic communication in the definition of the offense of aggravated harassment in the second degree
